title: What do you do against vlad?
body: Like every mid laner gets royally shit on by him. If he is in danger his pool saves him so hard. Once he builds {{item:3065}} , good luck even doing damage while he is double you health bursting harder than you. Like i legitimately dont know how to play against him

replies.body:
i typically just wave clear asap and avoid trading. 

for to kill vlad you really have to be an auto attacker with bork/stick potential.
everyone else has difficulty unless theres multiple people involved in taking him out or hes well out of position.
But how is that healthy for the game as a mid laner?

he scales up, buying spirit visage kills his damage output through early/midgame, it makes him team reliant and ult reliant to be of any use to a team. in addition hes powerless to stop a push. its a trade off for sure when compared to every other mid laner. but you're getting safety over damage.
Doesnt he get ap through hp though?  I guess thats true but like are you just not supposed to win lane?

he does but the amount is negligible.

its vlads lane to lose. but you could throw it harder. 

its difficult to kill him, but really your best bet at defeating vlad is with a well protected ADC as vlad usually holds off on buying zhonyas until later on in the game. but a jax/fiora will get the job done all the same.

you'd want to start by learning more about the champion you're having trouble facing. so try to _play him and learn_ what he can and cant do.
also building grievous wounds would be a good start
playing him currently. He isnt really too hard? He is actually really safe and makes me think he is actually op lmao. Also i do build grievous

adding to what creat knight said, a late game vlad will always be relevent through his ult, wave clear and sustain.  his biggest weak spot is early game, ask your jungler to make a early gank pre lvl 3 perferably (most of the time vlad doesnt get pool til then) and set him behind.  close down the lane early and you wont have to worry about him for a while.
